name: Chicken Salad
description: A healthy and delicious chicken salad made with fresh lettuce, grilled chicken, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light dressing.

name: Chicken Fry
description: Crispy and golden-brown fried chicken, seasoned with special spices and served hot for a satisfying crunch.

name: Fish Salad
description: A refreshing fish salad featuring grilled fish fillet, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and a zesty lemon dressing.

name: Soup
description: A warm and comforting bowl of homemade soup made with fresh vegetables, tender meat, and aromatic herbs.

name: Vegetable Salad
description: A nutritious vegetable salad packed with fresh lettuce, carrots, cucumbers, bell peppers, and a tangy dressing.

name: Pizza
description: A classic cheesy pizza topped with fresh vegetables, flavorful tomato sauce, and a crispy crust.
